channel.title: [PI] Lootshare
channel.description:
I would like to know how to program lootshare so, if anyone else in my clanchat does more damage then me, i will have a change to get the loot.
It is now so; The one who does the most damage gets the loot, and I want to change that, with your help.
-PI 562
~WhiteSanta
